function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High rate of global spread due to air travel","Impact":"Rapid transmission of the virus worldwide","Mitigation":"Implement stricter travel restrictions and quarantine measures","Technologies":"Travel screening, quarantine tracking apps","People":"Global travelers, airline staff, airport personnel","Owner":"Government, airline industry"},{"Description":"Transmission through aerosol acknowledged by WHO","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission in enclosed spaces","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation, wear masks in public spaces","Technologies":"HEPA filters, ventilation systems","People":"General public, indoor workers","Owner":"Building owners, health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of adherence to self-isolation and quarantine measures","Impact":"Continued spread of the virus within communities","Mitigation":"Enhance public awareness, enforce penalties for non-compliance","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, public health campaigns","People":"Quarantined individuals, general public","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"}]}
